events.description: DJ LeMahieu walks.
Aaron Judge strikes out swinging. 1 out
Gleyber Torres walks. DJ LeMahieu to 2nd.
Austin Wells doubles (2) on a sharp line drive to center fielder Jack Suwinski. DJ LeMahieu scores. Gleyber Torres to 3rd.
Giancarlo Stanton walks.
Anthony Volpe pops out to shortstop Liover Peguero on the infield fly rule. 2 outs
Estevan Florial singles on a line drive to right fielder Joshua Palacios. Gleyber Torres scores. Austin Wells scores. Giancarlo Stanton to 2nd.
Oswald Peraza grounds into a force out, fielded by third baseman Ke'Bryan Hayes. Giancarlo Stanton out at 3rd. 3 outs
